affiliation.ce:source-text: Laboratoire Informatique d’Avignon (LIA), Université d’Avignon, Avignon, France

head.citation-title: A survey of quaternion neural networks
head.abstracts: © 2019, Springer Nature B.V.Quaternion neural networks have recently received an increasing interest due to noticeable improvements over real-valued neural networks on real world tasks such as image, speech and signal processing. The extension of quaternion numbers to neural architectures reached state-of-the-art performances with a reduction of the number of neural parameters. This survey provides a review of past and recent research on quaternion neural networks and their applications in different domains. The paper details methods, algorithms and applications for each quaternion-valued neural networks proposed.

affiliation.ce:source-text: Laboratoire Informatique d’Avignon (LIA), Université d’Avignon, Avignon, France

copyright.$: Copyright 2020 Elsevier B.V., All rights reserved.

affiliation.affilname: Université d'Avignon et des Pays du Vaucluse

coredata.dc:description: Quaternion neural networks have recently received an increasing interest due to noticeable improvements over real-valued neural networks on real world tasks such as image, speech and signal processing. The extension of quaternion numbers to neural architectures reached state-of-the-art performances with a reduction of the number of neural parameters. This survey provides a review of past and recent research on quaternion neural networks and their applications in different domains. The paper details methods, algorithms and applications for each quaternion-valued neural networks proposed.
coredata.dc:title: A survey of quaternion neural networks
